title: Time Played Tool
body:
Hi all,

I was told this would be the best place to talk about an idea I had for Riot.

After the recent Riot API changes, all of our beloved time played websites have gone offline so I wanted to propose this idea to Riot and the community. Would anyone be interested if Riot were to create a tool either on their website or in the client to see exactly how many hours you have played?

I would be interested to see how people feel about the idea!

Regards,
BOI

Edit: Syntax and grammar

replies.body:
This website is pretty reliable: https://wol.gg

It also tells you which champion you've spent the most time on.
